mapper.select: SELECT id,path,method,public_access,login_access,within,fd_level FROM iam_permission WHERE service_name = #{service} AND method = #{method}

SELECT imr.source_id FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_role_permission irp ON irp.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.source_type = #{sourceType} AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{userId} AND irp.permission_id = #{permissionId}
